actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce,  and the District of Columbia
actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce,  and the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to provide special pay for board certified Federal Employees who are employed in health science positions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Entitles board certified Federal employees in health services positions to special pay. Sets forth the rates of special pay, based on years of service, and provides for annual inflation adjustments .

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, to provide special pay for board certified Federal Employees who are employed in health science positions, and for other purposes.
